author: Ryan Roschke
title: Ed Sheeran Performing "Shape of You" at BBC Radio 1 | POPSUGAR Entertainment
text:
Ed Sheeran Performing "Shape of You" at BBC Radio 1 Surprise, We're Still Not Tired of Hearing Ed Sheeran Perform "Shape of You" February 21, 2017 by Ryan Roschke 1 Shares 
On Tuesday, Ed Sheeran turned up in the BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge to perform one of his latest hit singles, "Shape of You." We've seen so many iterations of the song in the past handful of weeks. In addition to releasing an acoustic version and a music video , the singer has also performed the song more than half a dozen times. With all that in mind, we're still over the moon about this performance, because the song is just that damn good. Check Sheeran out above. Related:
